profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2021-04-06 00:31:08 -0400.

repository.corpname: Digital Collections and Archives, Tufts University

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: This collection is organized into one series.

custodhist.head: Custodial History
custodhist.p: The first publication on campus specifically directed at alumni, the "Tufts College Graduate" began publication in 1903 and ceased publication in 1926, when it was replaced by the "Tufts Alumni Bulletin."

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This collection consists of bound volumes of the "Tufts College Graduate," from 1903 to 1926. Something of a post-graduate continuation of the literary magazine "Tuftonian," the Graduate contained essays, speeches, and poetry by Tufts alumni. The magazine also included reviews of books written by alumni. Only a small part of the publication was devoted to alumni news. As time went on, the Graduate began printing accounts of alumni events and meetings, as well as news of events occurring on campus. Additional unbound copies available in the reading room.

relatedmaterial.head: Related Materials
relatedmaterial.p: UP010, Tufts College Alumni Bulletin, DCA

processinfo.head: Processing status
processinfo.p: This collection is processed and open for research

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This series consists of bound volumes of the "Tufts College Graduate" from 1903 to 1926. Something of a post-graduate continuation of the literary magazine "Tuftonian," the Graduate contained essays, speeches, and poetry by Tufts alumni. The magazine also included reviews of books written by alumni. Only a small part of the publication was devoted to alumni news. As time went on, the Graduate began printing accounts of alumni events and meetings, as well as news of events occuring on campus. The first publication on campus specifically directed at alumni, the "Tufts College Graduate" began publication in 1903 and ceased publication in 1926, when it was replaced by the "Tufts Alumni Bulletin."
